overview:
Avi is the VP Business Development of Emoze, a revolutionary technology that pushes information and content to mobile devices in real-time.

Polak is responsible for all sales and business development-related activities for Emoze. He is a key member of the management board and, together with his sales teams, has successfully transformed Emoze from a start-up to a multi-million dollar business and a major player in the telecommunication software industry.

He attended the Jerusalem College of Technology and studied Technology Management & Marketing.
